greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest number k such that the reduced totient function psi(k) = A002174(n).
comment: For each of the values in A002174, there are only a finite number of numbers k such that psi(k)=A002174(n). This sequence gives the largest such k. Sequence A002396 gives the least k. The number of such k is given in A143408. When A002174(n) is twice a Sophie Germain prime, then a(n) is particularly small.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
xref: Cf. A002322 (reduced totient function), A002174, A002396, A143408.
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Aug 13 2008
